name: Hook It and Book It
description:
• WASD/Arrow keys: aim
  • Spacebar: Extend hook
  • R: Restart level
  • Click on the sound/music icons to toggle audio

Use your hook to escape enemies and survive as long as you can. But be aware - when you move, so do the bad guys! Survive the allotted time to advance each level.

Source code: https://github.com/cornibulus/Hooks

Sprite pack: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Inspiration: https://itch.io/jam/miz-jam-1

Total make time:  24h 08m
